content:
The HL7 FHIR Connectathon 28 will take place next week September 13-15, 2021. The TestScript and FHIR Testing Track is again part of this Connectathon. Our Kick-off meeting will take place tomorrow September 10th at 3:00pm ET where we will have an informal review of the track objectives and answer any questions to help prepare for the Connectathon.

Please find the Kick-off meeting scheduled in the Whova Agenda for the Connectathon.

Looking forward to speaking with you tomorrow.
